attacks.name: Squeeze
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, this attack does 10 damage.

attacks.name: Spike Barrage
attacks.effect: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy attached to Omastar. This attack does 20 damage plus 20 more for each heads.
